Happy Labor Day, everyone! It’s been a long eight months in 2025 for those of us working constantly, and today is a day to pat ourselves on the back and celebrate all the hard work we’ve accomplished. As always, September’s starting holiday brings a myriad of solid Green Deals on eco-friendly EV, power station, tool, and appliance deals – and we’ve rounded up all the ones still going strong for all your one-stop shopping needs. One thing to note, the power station sales may have been deemed as ending before today’s arrival; however, as is often the case, these sales have been extended and/or had their official names changed, so be sure to browse through those for hangover savings.
